item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

Olde School Saloon and Bistro

I have a confession.... one of my FAVORITE spots in Connecticut is Olde School. (Don't tell the other restaurants now... they might not give us happy hour specials ;D ) It's my goal in life to share this love with everyone.

So many places try 'too hard' to offer something for everyone, and they end up offering a half....baked version of something lame that pleases no one. Not Olde School. They manage to please seemingly every different set of clientele, from gourmet foodies, hipsters, high brow Yale alum, broke yuppies and punks. The staff is great, the food is amazing and the atmosphere is perfect. You can have everything from pizza & wings to to-die-for salads (try the asparagus one!) or a great steak.

Olde School Saloon and Bistro is located at State near Court St, across from the train station. From the vintage copper bar right down to the classic antique punch-button cash register, this is a great place.

The smell of yucca fries with chipotle sauce doesnâ€™t hurt their charm either : )

Special: $2 Retro Beers

A sampling of complimentary food

The contact for this event is Dev, phone number in RSVP

www.oldeschoolsaloonandbistro.com

Hope to see you all there.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... it's a come-whenever-you-want kind of thing.

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
